typedef struct ABSController ABSController;

/* constant for state machine data */
#define ABSCONTROLLER_HISTORY_SIZE 2

/* variable part of ActorClass (RAM) */
struct ABSController {
	const ABSController_const* const constData;

	/* data send ports */

	/*--------------------- attributes ---------------------*/
	 float64 wheelstart;
